name: captions_list
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool youtube_v3_v2.
Tool description: Get youtube data without any youtube data api key
API description: Returns a list of caption tracks that are associated with a specified video

part.description: The part parameter specifies a comma-separated list of one or more caption resource properties that the API response will include.

videoid.description: The YouTube video ID for which the caption tracks are being requested.
